2 firms get IPO nod 
2019-12-04
China’s securities regulator has given the nod to the registration-based initial public offering of two companies on the science and technology innovation board.
   Guangdong Huate Gas Co Ltd, a gas products provider, and Beijing Longruan Technologies Inc, an information technology company, will be listed on the Shanghai Stock Exchange’s sci-tech innovation board, commonly known as the STAR market, according to the China Securities Regulatory Commission. It did not specify the total amount of funds to be raised.
